thread.title: ‚ÄòA Very Nice and Decent Person‚Äô: Twitter Mourns the Death of Alan Colmes
thread.title_full: ‚ÄòA Very Nice and Decent Person‚Äô: Twitter Mourns the Death of Alan Colmes

author: Ken Meyer
title: ‚ÄòA Very Nice and Decent Person‚Äô: Twitter Mourns the Death of Alan Colmes
text:
‚ÄòA Very Nice and Decent Person‚Äô: Twitter Mourns the Death of Alan Colmes by Ken Meyer | 11:16   
Twitter is observing a significant outpouring of grief today over the death of veteran broadcaster and Fox News commentator Alan Colmes . 
Fox announced the news on Thursday morning , which comes a month after Colmes said he was taking a break from the network due to health reasons. The network said that Colmes‚Äôs death came after a ‚Äúbrief illness,‚Äù and Fox gave tribute to his lifetime of accomplishments in a segment narrated by Colmes‚Äôs old conservative sparring partner, Sean Hannity . 
News of Colmes‚Äôs passing immediately took off on Twitter, and there were expressions of sadness and loss from a wide variety of pundits and media figures: Oh, no! That's tragic. A really nice person who made a profound contribution to the national political dialogue. Condolences to his family. https://t.co/XwBhvmKQcY 
‚Äî Noah Rothman (@NoahCRothman) February 23, 2017 Sad to learn about @AlanColmes passing. A very nice and decent person. 
‚Äî andrew kaczynski ü§î (@KFILE) February 23, 2017 . @AlanColmes was a kind and often hilarious man. I enjoyed debating, but personally liked him even more. I will miss him. RIP. 
‚Äî Brent Bozell (@BrentBozell) February 23, 2017 So sorry to hear about the passing of Alan Colmes, who was always so kind and generous to me. 
‚Äî Olivia Nuzzi (@Olivianuzzi) February 23, 2017 Whoa. Alan Colmes died. We sparred a bunch, but decent guy. RIP. 
‚Äî Jonah Goldberg (@JonahNRO) February 23, 2017 Goodbye to Alan Colmes, a generous and wonderful man who was the first to fight the good fight on FNC. 
‚Äî Julie Roginsky (@julieroginsky) February 23, 2017 So sad to hear of the death of Fox News colleague Alan Colmes. He and I agreed on little, but I liked him immensely. Good guy. R.I.P. 
‚Äî Brit Hume (@brithume) February 23, 2017 Very sad to report our friend and colleague @AlanColmes has passed away. Alan was one nice, happy bright light. RIP AC. 
‚Äî Eric Bolling (@ericbolling) February 23, 2017 Way back in the day, I booked and produced guests at Fox News‚ÄìI had honor to work for @AlanColmes , who was sharp, smart, and kind. RIP
